title: Gold Ranked 5s Team LF Support
body:
requirements:

good attitude
working mic + skype
gold 5 solo queue/diamond 5 ranked 5s minimum

replies.body: Chuck as an add. Plat 1 morg and janna 2 trick, I liked what you said when you got roasted by LS, i hope it will happen again
omg hi x, i would like to join your team, but i do not understand how to play support, and im very shy so i prefer not to talk :O but i have skype :D {{champion:117}}
Chuck as an add. Plat 3 support main
unimpressed with both attitude and ability.
Ah that's a shame, I was learning a lot from you
